sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./SearchResults.css"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import busData from "../data/busSearchResults.json"; // ✅ import your JSON function SearchResults() { const location = useLocation(); const { from, to, date } = location.state || {}; // Optional: filter data by city if needed const results = busData.filter( (bus) => bus.departCity.toLowerCase() === from.toLowerCase() && bus.arrivalCity.toLowerCase() === to.toLowerCase() ); return (

{from} → {to} on {date}

{results.map((bus) => (
{bus.company}

{bus.type}

Route: {bus.route}

{bus.departTime}

{bus.departDate}

{bus.departCity}

~5-8h

{bus.arrivalTime}

{bus.arrivalDate}

{bus.arrivalCity}

৳{bus.price}

{bus.seats} Seat(s) Available

Cancellation Policy Boarding Point Dropping Point Amenities
))}
); } export default SearchResults;
